about_the_game:
This is a demo version where you can play in a Chinese-style open RPG world as a customizable cultivation protagonist, freely developing your abilities, skills, and beast taming. With the support of various lifestyle gameplay elements, you continuously fight, improve your cultivation, and break through realms to experience this cultivation world.

In this demo version, you can only experience parts of life and combat in the Qi Refining and Foundation Establishment stages of the cultivation world, including the sect skills of the Foundation Establishment stage that are open in the demo, as well as some gameplay elements such as alchemy, weapon forging, and beast taming.This is a demo version that allows you to play as a customizable cultivation protagonist in a Chinese-style open RPG world. Through various life play elements, you can continuously engage in combat, improve your cultivation, and break through realms to experience this cultivation world. In this demo version, you can only experience parts of life and combat during the Qi Refining and Foundation Establishment stages of the cultivation world, including some open gameplay such as alchemy, weapon forging, and beast taming that are available in the demo.
detailed_description:
About us

We are an independent development team that is amateur and non-programmer, consisting of three novices from different professions.

Everything is new for us to learn, and our game's design points are also distinctly different from many similar games on the market due to our atypical nature. Of course, the development of the game is also slow as a result, which is why we have opened a beta version and released an early access version of the game.

However, we will do our best to create a unique game, both for the players within the game and for the game itself. That is our original intention!


About the Demo

This is a demo version where you can play in a Chinese-style open RPG world as a customizable cultivation protagonist, freely developing your abilities, skills, and beast taming. With the support of various lifestyle gameplay elements, you continuously fight, improve your cultivation, and break through realms to experience this cultivation world.

In this demo version, you can only experience parts of life and combat in the Qi Refining and Foundation Establishment stages of the cultivation world, including the sect skills of the Foundation Establishment stage that are open in the demo, as well as some gameplay elements such as alchemy, weapon forging, and beast taming.This is a demo version that allows you to play as a customizable cultivation protagonist in a Chinese-style open RPG world. Through various life play elements, you can continuously engage in combat, improve your cultivation, and break through realms to experience this cultivation world. In this demo version, you can only experience parts of life and combat during the Qi Refining and Foundation Establishment stages of the cultivation world, including some open gameplay such as alchemy, weapon forging, and beast taming that are available in the demo.
name: 寻仙问道 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: inter{R)Coce(TM) i3-370m
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any PC with sound
  • Additional Notes: any normal pc can play
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: inter{R)Coce(TM) i3-370m
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any PC with sound
  • Additional Notes: any normal pc can play

short_description: This is a demo version, where you, as the protagonist, unexpectedly enter the world of cultivation, but your current body has deep ties to this world. Behind the complex events, you can experience parts of the Qi Refining and Foundation Establishment stages in the demo!
